description: Overview* Some newer camcorders and digital cameras are equipped with a mini HDMI connector to support high resolution content.* This adapter easily adapts a standard male HDMI Cable to a mini HDMI connector to ensure HD connection.Specifications* Supports 4K (3840x2160), Deep Color, TrueHD, DTS-HD and 3D* Compact design for easy transport and storage* Gold Plated Connectors* Type A HDMI to Type C Mini HDMI Male to Female
title: Cable Matters Gold Plated HDMI to Mini HDMI Female to HDMI Male Adapter
